idea: Esthetique Le Divine was conceived for the sole goal of boosting one's self-esteem. Our purpose is to improve and beautify people's perceptions of themselves. We strive to provide unrivaled assistance and services to everyone, including patient assessment and relevant consultations. A hardworking team and a diligent leader always make it to the top. Our goal is for every client to leave with a grin on their face and a head held high, and we strive to do this with nothing but genuine passion. Our objective is to embody a centre of knowledge, professional attitudes, patient-centred care, establish comfort, maintain ethical as well as optimal care. In addition, we seek to grow and improve in order to serve a wider number of clients. We provide skin care treatements.
name: ESTHETIQUE LE DIVINE SKIN AND HAIR LLP

idea:
CAPL - Cromulent Ausweg Private Limited, is a multi‐dimensional Management Firm headquartered at Mumbai with Pan India Presence. We have great pleasure to introduce ourselves as an ISO: IAF 9001:2015 Certified Premium Service Provider, which specializes services such as Security, Housekeeping & Other Facility Management Services. The prominent elements of our services include versatility, efficiency and consecration that ensure complete satisfaction for all our customers.

Being a significant part of the CAPL, we have a fully equipped, modern and centrally located office run by thoroughbred qualified professionals - having wide-ranging in-line experience to deliver terrific solutions. Innovation, Economy & Service have been the potential of our workforce intended for and offered to our clients.

We have constantly strived to modernize, refine, and rejuvenate our service profile to keep stride with the changing and thorough demands of our clients. As a matter of policy, we maintain an effective interface with our customers to be in touch with the realities on ground.
name: CROMULENT AUSWEG PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Product Status: Ready


Problem Statement: Small & home businesses doesnt have space in growing their business in digital space. 


Solution: We have created the digital marketplace mobile phone based application ( ONE common platform for Sellers & Buyers) wherein every smallest seller can create their product store for FREE & bring the store in marketplace where buyers can place order & get the products from selected seller.

Here, sellers will decide the products, price & place. 


The platform is completely dynamic & works on geographic logic as like any E-commerce marketplace.


Business Opportunity: While we will provide basic version for FREE for every seller, various premium features will fetch us annual subscriptions, also will be running in app banner ads (localised till the level of 1 pincode) for small businesses including FMCG, Consumer durable , Vehicles, Agriculture products & service brands. 


Business Status: Go to Market


Phase 1 Plan: State ( Maharashtra)
name: DUOWIN LYFTECH SERVICES LLP

idea:
Wed On Web is a potential annual business for this project.

1) According to Wikipedia survey, the size of wedding industry in India is over 30 Billion dollars. In India, more than one crore marriages take place in a year, & It is increasing by 20 to 25 percent. 

2) Even in today's modern mobile age, a lot of money is spent on photographers. After a huge amount of money spent on photography, these memories just stay at home in the form of photo albums, they can't be passed on to your loved ones, but now it's easily possible.

3) In this venture, a photo album website will cost the customer only Rs. 149/-, Which is insignificant compared to the total wedding Photography cost.

4) The business can generate an annual turnover of over Rs 500 crore, which is even higher considering the revenue from other advertising sectors.
name: Wed On WEb

idea:
My idea is basically about social media for photographers. Not professional but anyone, you just have to click photos except yourself, for eg., Nature, stars, dogs, cats anything. It will be like instagram, many talented people are not getting recognised on social media platforms because of too tok stars or normal stars. I just want to give them a chance. My application will be like mixture of linkedin and instagram. 

These are some steps to create an account,

1) enter ur personal details like email id and create a password like normal sites.

2) Choose your favourite 5-10 pics and application will create 15 seconds of video by merging them.

3) you can see all merges by swiping in an explore option. ( There will be an explore option in the middle)

4) if you pay 25 rs then we will show your photos on the top. 

I have all plan cleared please just consider me
name: ExploreMore
